snippet: Van Halen has invited music writers to a small show at Cafe Wha?, the latest enigmatic hint to the band's plans for a 2012 tour.
abstract: Van Halen has invited music writers to a small show at Cafe Wha?, the latest enigmatic hint to the band's plans for a 2012 tour.
lead_paragraph: Van Halen has invited music writers and critics to an intimate concert at Cafe Wha? in Greenwich Village on Thursday night as a prelude to a tour with the band's classic lineup later this year. Nothing official has been released, but journalists have been told the group will play a short set. The one-night performance in that 250-seat club on MacDougal Street in Manhattan marks the latest enigmatic hint that the band has sent about its plans for the year.

headline.main: Van Halen, Stalwart Arena-Rock Band, to Play Intimate Set at Small Club
